attributes.action: deny any extension planned for the 1967 Abortion Act to Northern Ireland, as we believe in the right to life.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "deny any extension planned for the 1967 Abortion Act to Northern Ireland, as we believe in the right to life."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19063


Prime Minister's Office
